description: Try our easy to follow Passionfruit Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Passionfruit Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place icing sugar into a small bowl. Add remaining butter and passionfruit pulp and stir until smooth. Remove slice from tin and spread over icing. Cut into squares to serve.
